name: nfcxfrd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
-| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)

comment: A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
